attributes.action: Stop Paypal From Operating In The UK If They Continue Seizing Users Funds
attributes.additional_details:
Watchdog have investigated this issue http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/articles/B0Ss1cbvMdmsHpn1LkgJZz/paypal

https://mywifequitherjob.com/why-paypal-freezes-or-limits-accounts-and-how-to-prevent-this-from-happening-to-you/

https://uk.trustpilot.com/review/www.paypal.co.uk

My own experience with paypal resulted in a 150 day wait to close my account and withdraw funds. Effectively disrupting the cash flow of my business.

A quick search shows that this isn't an isolated incident. It is common.
attributes.background: Paypal routinely randomly freeze users accounts, sequester funds for extended periods of time and have awful uncooperative customer service and rude management teams. As a company which millions of people in the UK rely upon, the government should force them to reform or cease operating in the UK.

rejection.details:
We are not sure what action you want the UK Government or Parliament to take.

The UK Government and Parliament can't impose regulations on a single named company. 

You could start a new petition calling for a change to financial services regulations, calling for the changes you want to see to apply to all companies that process payments for consumers and small businesses.
